unnormalised: Arre yaar, heard Adv. Sharma is handling the Gupta family's property dispute. Apparently, they're fighting over ancestral land worth Rs. 50 lakhs in Faridabad. My cousin told me the case number is Civil Suit 45/2023, filed in the District Court. Hope they settle it soon, these family matters can drag on for yrs!
normalised: Arre yaar, heard Advocate Sharma is handling the Gupta family's property dispute. Apparently, they are fighting over ancestral land worth rupee fifty lakh in Faridabad. My cousin told me the case number is Civil Suit forty five slash two thousand and twenty three, filed in the District Court. Hope they settle it soon, these family matters can drag on for years!
